title: Bombardier - Revenues by segment 2018
summary: This statistic shows the Billion U.S. of the by at the Transportation of a Segment in the Revenues in 2018 , according to whether it is the by 's first , second third , or fourth Segment .
It reveals that in 2018 women in the Revenues on Billion were 1.76 years old when they had their first Segment .
If they had a second Segment , on Billion it came a little over two years later , when they were 4.99 years old .
gold: This statistic gives a breakdown of Bombardier 's revenue in the fiscal year of 2018 , by segment . The Montreal-headquartered company had revenues of approximately five billion U.S. dollars in its business aircraft segment .
